testcase.name: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome Browser............................................passed When User Opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"..............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"......passed And Click on Login..........................................................passed Then Page Title Should be "Dashboard/nopCommerce administration"............passed When User click on Logout Link..............................................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
